attributes.action: Pressurise the government to stop the blockade in Gaza and abuse of human rights
attributes.background: Everyday Palestinians are continuously being attacked and killed as well as their human rights being abused. This is due to the Israeli government,terrorising innocent Palestinians. With your signature,we can help put an end to this injustice.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216561

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217977

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220026

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
